EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.POL.none.N.G.N.9216.FN POL.Email 12 - Is your LAN costing you twice
EmailTemplate.subject: Is your LAN costing you twice as much as it should?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Bring your LAN up to light speed Traditional local area networks are a costly burden on most organizations. But a new solution called Passive Optical LAN can bring better performance AND significant cost savings. If that sounds too good to be true, see for yourself. Find out how much you could save by inputting a few basic details about your requirements into the Nokia LAN Savings Calculator. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
